body: I wish we could get a rich and powerful mc that controls everything and has everything he wants and isn't married... even though all the ladies around are literally begging him for sex and he is above the law... I'm talking about something higher than a president... because in most developed countries they are hidden people that control the affairs of the country sometimes it's not necessarily the president... sometimes he just a puppet...I would really love to see something like that but the mc isn't a president... he is sought of a Godfather although he young
